entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
